name: vintage 1960s top 60s teal gingham plaid tank top with peplum ruffle | summer picnic blouse
description:
Vintage 1960s tank top.
Teal plaid top with adjustable bow tie straps,
cinched elastic waist, and sweet peplum ruffle.
This would look lovely paired with
high-waisted sailor shorts or crisp capris
for a quintessentially '1960s Summer' look.
Such a sweet warm weather top, perfect for picnics,
cookouts, and bicycle rides to the market.
In excellent condition.

measurements →

length - 15½" from bottom of strap
bust - 33"
waist - 18 - 28" comfortably
estimated size - xs, small
brand - union made, ILGWU label
era - 1960s



condition notes:
- in excellent condition, no noted flaws.


→ shipping: 

US shipping | USPS priority with delivery confirmation. 
International shipping | USPS first class mail.

name: edwardian leather boots antique 1910s brown leather lace up boots | powder keg boots
description:
Antique Edwardian brown leather lace-up boots. 
The most perfectly worn in Fall boot. 
They still have the original laces, and I will also send along a modern replacement pair (brand new and unused, I just strung one through a boot to make sure the length was correct).

measurements →

length from outside - 9¾"
length from inside - 9"
width from outside - 3"
heel - 1"
height - 7"
estimated size - fits like a 5 - 5½.
material - leather
era - 1910s-1920s

→ Please contact me with any questions.
